page.title: 07COEDPOETH VILLAGE
page.content: {Coedpoeth}is an urban village which is situated on the A525 Ruthin to Wrexham road.It has a population of approximately four and a half thousand and is self sufficient as a village. However,the vast majority of the populace use the supermarkets in the nearby town of Wrexham for their weekly shop. The health of the villagers is catered for by the presence of three doctors,each having approximately 3,000 patients on their medical register.Some of these patients will be from outside the area. The village has three schools,an English infant school,an English junior school and a Welsh primary school.The children are taught through the medium of English in both the English schools - Welsh being a compulsory second language.
